Text.Page:
Argon behemoths keep wrecking our troop formations, making it hard to organize our resistance.

I'm sending you to kill suulvir raptors, arzakaar thassalirs, and akalath overseers.

Report to {@LinkCreature:76#1603} in Kanstria when you've completed your mission.
I'm glad we've got soldiers like you, <PCNAME>. Well done.
You haven't achieved your objectives yet. Sorry.
